mdq:check.name: Resource Distribution Contact Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a distribution contact exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A distribution contact is not present if 'distributionContact' not in globals() or distributionContact is None or len(distributionContact) == 0: output = "No distribution contact was found." status = "FAILURE" return False
if (mvar.isBlank(distributionContact)): output = "The distribution contact is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: contact = mvar.toUnicode(distributionContact) # Check if resource identifier type is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(contact, list)): output = "The distribution contact '{}' was found (first of {} contacts).".format(contact[0], len(contact)) else: output = "The distribution contact '{}' was found.".format(contact)
status = "SUCCESS" return True
